General.Name: Intertainment AG
General.Description: Intertainment AG engages in the acquisition and exploitation of film rights in Europe. The company also trades in film licenses; and produces, co-produces, and merchandizes films. It distributes its films through various distribution channels, such as cinema, DVD, Pay-TV, and free-TV. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Feldafing, Germany.
General.Address: 220 Nice Lane, Newport Beach, CA, United States, 92663
